taxonConcepts.nameAccordingTo: Species 2000 & ITIS Catalogue of Life: April 2013
IUCN Red List (Species Assessed for Global Conservation)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Inhabits near-shore surface waters.  Firm flesh is highly valued (Ref. 4967).  Largest African cichlid (Ref. 4537).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Africa:  Endemic to and widely distributed in Lake Tanganyika.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Size
dataObjects.title: Max. size
dataObjects.description: 65.0 cm TL (male/unsexed; (Ref. 4976)); max. published weight: 4,500 g (Ref. 681)
dataObjects.references: Brichard, P. 1978 Fishes of Lake Tanganyika. T.F.H. Publications, Inc., Neptune City, New Jersey. (Ref. 681)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Habitat
dataObjects.title: Environment
dataObjects.description: pelagic; freshwater; pH range: 9.0; dH range: 10; depth range ? - 85 m

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#LifeCycle
dataObjects.description: Deposits eggs in abandoned nests of other cichlids, in between stones, or in the sand, if no nests are available (Ref. 7343).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Uses
dataObjects.title: Importance
dataObjects.description: fisheries: commercial; gamefish: yes; aquarium: commercial
